articles.author: Tara Bannow
articles.title: Major health insurer group says members will continue to cover vaccines, a step that may ease anxiety over access - statnews.com
articles.description: Amid concern about Americans’ access to vaccines, a major health insurance association said member plans will continue to cover all shots recommended by the ACIP.
articles.content: Amid growing concern about Americans access to vaccines, the countrys biggest health insurance association said its member plans will continue to cover all shots recommended by a federal advisory com… [+3532 chars]
